answers.answer: Yes  I'm going through the same exact thing.. I'll be 37 weeks in 3 days..
Ohh ok good to know I'm not the only one. Is it maybe because we are close to our due day?
I'm sure it is! Almost there!!
I'll be 37 weeks in 4 days we are so close to each other omg :D
Yes totally normal! I'm 36+4 weeks pregnant and experience this on a daily basis. Not to mention my hips kill me and the pressure on my crotch is almost unbearable.
Oh I feel so much Bette knowing I'm not the only one :-)

I am also 36 weeks and 3 days.  My belly button has been hurting for what seems like forever.   I have a lot of pain in my crotch as well as my lower back.   Its almost unbearable but I know the end is quickly approaching.   Im being induced in about 2 weeks due to gestational diabetes if I don't go into labor on my own sooner.

question: Hello ladies I'm almost 37 weeks pregnant and for the last 2 weeks I been feeling my belly sore. Specially on the bottom and my belly button feels so sensitive. When my boyfriend touch it it felt sore and sensitive. Is this normal?
title: 36 weeks pregnant belly pain?
